title: COVID-19 Dashboard
description: Used by more than 50k users, this project provided a comprehensive view of the COVID-19 pandemic.

body.raw:
<Image
  src="/projects/covid/floating.png"
  alt="COVID-19 Dashboard"
  width={2580}
  height={1691}
/>

<Image
  src="/projects/covid/phones.png"
  alt="COVID-19 Dashboard"
  width={1905}
  height={1409}
  caption="Mobile view of application, including list of key statistics, the map of daily growth, and the fully interactive map made using Mapbox."
/>

  src="/projects/covid/tablet.png"
  alt="COVID-19 Dashboard"
  width={2580}
  height={1691}
  caption="Tablet view of the dashboard's home page. The application is designed to be responsive to all platforms and devices."
/>

title: Hines
description: Designing and developing Internal software used to manage the companies $95.79 billion of dollars in private real-estate assets.

title: Gatsby.js Medium Blog
description: Blog website built with Gatsby JS and hosted on Netlify. Perfect for a personal website. Fully featured with tagged blog posts, a link tree, affiliate links, a smooth contact form, and so much more.

body.raw:
<Image 
  src="/projects/medium/og.png"
  alt="og"
  width={2267}
  height={1280}
/>

<Image 
  src="/projects/medium/phones.png"
  alt="2"
  width={3062}
  height={2042}
  caption="Mobile view, featuring detail view of a blog post, list view of blog posts, a seamless contact form, and a page to showcase gear with affiliate links."
/>

<Image 
  src="/projects/medium/tablet.png"
  alt="3"
  width={2267}
  height={1280}
  caption="Blog post's transform responsively to fit the screen. Sidebars for navigation and meta data are then shown."
/>

<Image 
  src="/projects/medium/dark computer.png"
  alt="5"
  width={5412}
  height={3246}
  caption="Application uses preferred system theme."
/>

<Image 
  src="/projects/medium/light computer.png"
  alt="4"
  width={5412}
  height={3246}
  caption="Or can be manually set to light or dark mode."
/>
